title: Sonbong Sports Club
text:
Sŏnbong Sports Club is a <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club from <a href="Ras%C5%8Fn">Rasŏn</a>, affiliated with the <a href="Worker-Peasant%20Red%20Guards">Worker-Peasant Red Guards</a>. They play in the <a href="DPR%20Korea%20League">DPR Korea Premier Football League</a>.
Their home ground is <a href="Rajin%20Stadium">Rajin Stadium</a>. Sonbong is a region in <a href="Rason">Rason</a> called <a href="Sonbong%20County">Sonbong County</a>.
The <a href="Sonbong%20Sports%20Club%20%28women%29">Sŏnbong women's football team</a> plays in the <a href="DPR%20Korea%20Women%27s%20League">DPR Korea Women's League</a>, since earning promotion from Division 2 at the end of 2014.
